Details

Top-level hint menu. As a convenience, an object defined of this class will automatically register itself as the top-level hint menu during pre-initialization. `class `**`TopHintMenu`**` :   `[`HintMenu`](../object/HintMenu.html)[`PreinitObject`](../object/PreinitObject.html)
